info.title: API BASE
info.description: Servicio API REST para la gestión y administración del sistema Automatizado de riego por goteo

get.summary: Get list of drip irrigation modules
get.description: Returns list of drip irrigation modules

parameters.name: estate_irrigation_system_id
parameters.description: The ID of the estate irrigation system

get.description:
Returns list of irrigation systems filter by its type of system and irrgation header 
     *      (filtro por tipo de sistema de riego o cabezal de riego)

parameters.name: irrigation_system_id
parameters.description: The ID of the type of system (tipo: goteo, aspersión, ..)

parameters.name: irrigation_header_id
parameters.description: The ID of the irrigation header of the system (cabezal de riego)

post.description: Invalida el token actual y genera uno nuevo

get.summary: Obtiene la información del usuaro autenticado
get.description: Obtiene la información del usuaro autenticado

get.summary: Get list of water source types
get.description: Returns list of water source types

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the irrigation system (min: 3 characters)

estate_irrigation_system_id.title: EstateIrrigationSystemId
estate_irrigation_system_id.description: The ID of the irrigation system (sistema de riego de una hacienda)

dropper_type_id.title: DropperTypeId
dropper_type_id.description: The ID of the dropper type (el tipo de un gotero)

dropper_flow.title: Dropper flow
dropper_flow.description: The flow of the dropper (flujo del gotero)

surco_separation_id.title: SurcoSeparationId
surco_separation_id.description: The ID of the surco separation (separación entre surcos)

dropper_separation.title: Dropper separation
dropper_separation.description: The separation between droppers (separación entre goteros mts)

irrigation_strategy_id.title: IrrigationStrategyId
irrigation_strategy_id.description: The ID of the irrigation strategy (estrategia de riego)

irrigation_amount_minutes.title: IrrigationMinutes
irrigation_amount_minutes.description: Minutes for the irrigation (minutos de riego)

irrigation_frequency_days.title: IrrigationDays
irrigation_frequency_days.description: The amount of irrigation days per week (# días de riego a la semana)

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the irrigation system (min: 3 characters)

dropper_type_id.title: DropperTypeId
dropper_type_id.description: The ID of the dropper type (el tipo de un gotero)

dropper_flow.title: Dropper flow
dropper_flow.description: The flow of the dropper (flujo del gotero)

surco_separation_id.title: SurcoSeparationId
surco_separation_id.description: The ID of the surco separation (separación entre surcos)

dropper_separation.title: Dropper separation
dropper_separation.description: The separation between droppers (separación entre goteros mts)

irrigation_strategy_id.title: IrrigationStrategyId
irrigation_strategy_id.description: The ID of the irrigation strategy (estrategia de riego)

irrigation_amount_minutes.title: IrrigationMinutes
irrigation_amount_minutes.description: Minutes for the irrigation (minutos de riego)

irrigation_frequency_days.title: IrrigationDays
irrigation_frequency_days.description: The amount of irrigation days per week (# días de riego a la semana)

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the irrigation system (min: 3 characters)

minimum_tension.title: MinimumTension
minimum_tension.description: The minimum tension for the system (configuration)

maximum_tension.title: MaximumTension
maximum_tension.description: The maximum tension for the system (configuration)

minimum_level_water.title: MinimumLevelWater
minimum_level_water.description: The minimum level of water for the system (configuration)

maximum_level_water.title: MaximumLevelWater
maximum_level_water.description: The maximum level of water for the system (configuration)

start_time.title: Start Time
start_time.description: The initial time to start system operations (format hh:mm:ss 24h)

end_time.title: End Time
end_time.description: The final time of the system operations (format hh:mm:ss 24h)

irrigation_system_id.title: IrrigationSystemId
irrigation_system_id.description: The ID of the irrigation system

irrigation_header_id.title: IrrigationHeaderId
irrigation_header_id.description: The ID of the irrigation header (cabezal de riego)

water_source_id.title: WaterSourceId
water_source_id.description: The ID of the water source (Fuente de agua)

motorpump_brand.title: Motorpump brand
motorpump_brand.description: The brand of the motorpump (la marca de la motobomba)

motorpump_reference.title: Motorpump reference
motorpump_reference.description: The reference of the motorpump (la ref de la motobomba)

motorpump_hp.title: Motorpump HP
motorpump_hp.description: The HP of the motorpump (caballos de fuerza de la motobomba)

motorpump_flow.title: Motorpump flow
motorpump_flow.description: The flow of the motorpump (flujo de la motobomba)

capacity.title: Capacity
capacity.description: Capacity of the Water Source / M3 para Reservorio , Rio and Pozo M3/h

uptake_time.title: UptakeTime
uptake_time.description: Uptake Timeof the Water Source in hours

type_id.title: TypeId
type_id.description: The ID of the water source Type: (Rio, Pozo, Reservorio)

estate_id.title: EstateId
estate_id.description: The ID of the estate where belongs the water source

jwt_key.description: Debe insertar el token generado en el proceso de autenticación
jwt_key.name: Authorization

tags.name: Autenticación
